# Trip Vine (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** One 10-ft. square/level (S)

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** Reflex negates; see text

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Heroes of Battle (WotC)­, pg. 128

*Trip vine* causes plants within the area to grow together to form a tangle. Any creature entering an affected square must succeed on a Refl ex save or fall prone. Any creature charging into an affected square takes a –2 penalty on its saving throw.

If this spell is cast on an area of undergrowth, saves against the spell take a –2 penalty.
